Changelog for rt.ploneversions
==============================

1.0.0 (2020-03-10)
------------------

- Better error message when we cannot read the versions.cfg from dist.plone.org
- Python 3 support. If you need to use this package on Python2 please use the 0.9.2 version.
  [ale-rt]


0.9.2 (2019-10-26)
------------------

- Use https URLs
  [ale-rt]


0.9.1 (2013-10-06)
------------------

- Suggest usage
  [ale-rt]


0.9.0 (2013-10-01)
------------------

- Initial release
  [ale-rt]
